question: As per the Gartner 2019 Digital Workplace Survey, which is the most digitally skilled country in the world, with the largest and skilled Gen Z workforce?
explanation:
As per the Gartner 2019 Digital Workplace Survey, India is the most digitally dexterous or skilled country in the world. India has the largest Gen Z workforce who is also desirous to learn new skills using digital technologies.
As per the survey, 67 per cent of digital workers in India opined that emerging technologies like machine learning (ML), artificial intelligence (AI) and Internet of Things (IoT) increase their efficiency at workplaces. India is followed by the UK and the US in the survey.
